div.p: Welcome to the Web Sites Dashboard tab.
div.h2: Things to do from the Web Sites Dashboard tab

div.p: A Web Site is the host for a web application running in the cloud that you can control and manage.
The Web Siteâ€™s Dashboard tab is the gateway to your Web Sites. From here you can select a web site from the list of Web Sites and quickly perform the following actions:

ul.li: Associate other resources with the Web Site by clicking the Link icon.
Connect to the Web Site by clicking the Browse command.
Start or stop a website by clicking the Stop or Start icon at the bottom of the page.
Delete the Web Site with the Delete icon.
Reset your Git or FTP publishing credentials
Download a publish profile that can be imported by several popular development tools such as WebMatrix, Visual Web Developer, and Visual Studio.

div.p: Click the name of the Web Site displayed under the Name column to display the management pages for the Web Site.
